title: Change the default radio button selection on the "What should Firefox do with this file?" prompt
content:
I want the "Ask whether to open or save files" prompt to keep appearing (see attachment).

My grudge is with the default option that comes preselected when it appears.

I'd like it to be "Open with" instead of "Save File".

Is this possible?

I've googled this issue and also searched this site but the answers I've found are either pretty dated, unhelpful or not working currently.

Would appreciate if someone could point me in the right direction, confirming if what I want is actually possible (I'd swear it is, if memory serves right) and if so, how to achieve it.

Thanks in advance for your time if you read this!
creator: babre89

title: The "copy without site tracking" is not highlighted for selection in private mode.

title: "Save as" does not save the new dom anymor
content:
Hello,

I have a self-made JavaScript-HTML-Calendar on my local file system. I use JavaScript to change the dom, for example to mark a day in the calender as "holiday" or "work". When I use the "Save as" function of Firefox, Firefox does not save the new version of the dom anymore, it does not overwrite the HTML-file on the disc. It worked fine until mid october 2024, but it seems a recent update changed something.

It still works with other browsers, it is only Firefox i have this problem with.

Does somebody know which setting may have been changed causing this problem?

Thanks in advance
creator: michael.laus

title: Youtube lowering resolution on unwatched tab
content:
I'm running the desktop version of FF 132.0 with no adblockers.

When watching a YT video at 1080p, if I leave the tab to look at other tabs, when I go back to the video playing it's dropped the resolution to 640*360. It is annoying because I don't know if YT or FF is adjusting the resolution.

If have two instances of FF open with YT running in one tab only (on a single tab with no other tabs open), the I browse using the second instance of FF. The video still lowers in resolution, when I'm not actively watching.

Is it FF, YT or perhaps my GPU trying to save bandwidth?

My PC specs are 5900x, 32GB DDR4, rx7700xt running Windows 11.
creator: l1ft1ng

title: redirecting to a next page when hitting a NEXT button
content: This has happened on my 2 laptops with one particular website. Firefox is updated as required.... It has worked before. On the Norwegian ( NCL ) website , if you go to the " excursion " link , pick a port , you see the 1st available tours...at the bottom of the page stating " 1-12 of 24 NEXT." However when you click the " highlighted" NEXT , nothing happens.....I have tried every combinations of settings....This feature, however works on my other browser with No additional settings....I was Always able to accomplish this.
creator: mawkdavid

title: WidevineCdm Plugin Crash on Firefox
content:
I'm unable to stream content on Spotify and Netflix in Firefox due to a recurring "WidevineCdm plugin has crashed" error. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Steps I've already taken to troubleshoot:

  • Ensured "Play DRM-restricted content" is enabled in Firefox.
  • Tested with a completely clean Firefox profile.
  • Tried the portable version of Firefox (131.0.3) as well, but the same issue arose.
  • Verified that streaming works fine on Microsoft Edge and Google Chrome, so I don't think it's an issue with my PC or security software (I temporarily disabled it for testing purposes).
  • Made sure I'm not using any VPN or proxy.
  • Performed a clean reinstall of the latest Firefox version.

System information:

  • OS: Windows 11 (23H2)
  • Firefox version: 132.0
creator: orangehermit

title: Constant error "PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR"
content: I use Firefox Developer, on many sites, for no apparent reason, the error "Error establishing a secure connection" started popping up (error code: PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR. Even on YouTube, where everything was ok before, it's all crap now. HELP PLEASE
creator: BunnyGe

title: Youtube Notifications
content:
Since some time ago, Firefox-provided Youtube notifications (which appear in the lower right) have been failing. It both no longer shows me the actual notifications at time of video release or stream start, and ocassionally spams me with a massive deulge of outdated notifications (usually around a day old or so, yet it claims they are happening at the time the notifs happen) that keep repeating for a day before sometimes being replaced by different outdated notifications. This has persistend through several pc restarts, and relogging into both my Youtube and Firefox accounts. This is still ocurring, but on top of this, notifications have now stopped appearing as popouts.

The image shows a video the notification claims was released just 20 minutes before this post was made, yet the video in reality is almost a month old.
creator: mateorondon

title: Firefox e o CSP - Content-Security-Header
content:
Olá,

Há pouco tempo passei a usar as 'Security Headers' configuradas no .htaccess. Só houve um problema com a CSP - Content-Security-Policy, pois o Firefox desconfigura o site, que tem um Iframe. Os outros Browsers mais conhecidos navegam bem.

Já desabilitei todas as extensões e temas desses navegadores.

Estou usando a CSP dessa forma: Header set Content-Security-Policy "default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; img-src 'self'; style-src 'self';base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'"

Já tirei um por um até ficar assim: Header set Content-Security-Policy "default-src 'self'"

Mas o problema continua no Firefox. Alguma sugestão?

Apenas como informação:

Aparência do site normal, usando o Firefox (sem o CSP):

Aparência do site desconfigurado, usando o Firefox (com o CSP):
creator: Jeff123

title: All Sync Data Was Removed Upon Password Reset
content:
I submitted this as a bug report but I will also submit this here to see if anyone has any information or a solution.

After resetting my password, none of my sync data from before the install is there. Only the sync data from my laptop, but even on my laptop it no longer lists my old computer, it is as if my PC from before the new OS has simply been deleted from the sync logs. In fact, my sync logs only go back to the moment I changed my password. I am not sure how to proceed as it appears that there aren't even any traces of my sync from before this point.

It would be nice if I could get the old tabs I had open on my desktop before I changed my OS, but it's not exactly a "world ending" situation.
creator: liam.m.connorb

title: Can't edit extension settings
